Key Match Events: Tyler O’Neill hit a walk-off three-run home run in the bottom of the 10th inning.
Nick Pivetta struck out nine over six strong innings, allowing one run on four hits and one walk.
Dean Kremer pitched well, allowing two runs (one earned) over seven innings with five hits, two walks and seven strikeouts.
Anthony Santander hit a solo home run in the eighth inning to tie the game at 2-2.
Emmanuel Rivera hit a leadoff solo home run in the top of the third inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boston remains four games out of the last wild-card spot in the American League.
The Red Sox have 16 games to play to secure a playoff spot.
